hero.title: Mutual aid, connected.
hero.subtitle: Find help or find a local group — no accounts, no tracking, no personal info required.

individual.title: Need Help?
individual.subtitle: Connect with local mutual aid groups anonymously
individual.description: Create a private, encrypted mailbox. Local groups in your area can reach out to you—without you giving up any personal information.
features: No name, email, or phone number collected
Messages are encrypted—only you can read them

step1.title: Create a mailbox
step1.description: You'll get a passphrase. Write it down—it's the only way to check for messages.

step2.title: Choose your area and need
step2.description: Select your region and what kind of help you're looking for (rent, food, utilities, etc.).

step3.title: Groups reach out
step3.description: Local mutual aid groups can send you encrypted messages with resources or next steps.

step4.title: Connect directly
step4.description: If a group can help, you connect with them directly—outside of Relay.

privacy.title: Your privacy is protected
items: We never ask for your name, address, or ID
We don't track who visits this site
Messages are encrypted end-to-end
Everything auto-deletes after 7 days of inactivity

directory.title: Find a Group
directory.subtitle: Browse verified mutual aid groups in your area
directory.description: Search the public directory of verified mutual aid groups. Find groups by region or type of help they provide—and contact them directly.
features: Filter by type of help (rent, food, utilities)
No account, no cookies, no tracking
directory.privacy: The directory is public and doesn't track who visits. No login required.

org.title: For Organizations
org.subtitle: Fund hubs and mutual aid groups
org.description: Relay connects fund hubs with local mutual aid groups—moving resources faster while protecting the privacy of the people you serve.

forHubs.title: For Fund Hubs
items: Manage a network of verified mutual aid groups
Review and approve funding requests
Track disbursements with aggregate reporting
No individual recipient data—ever

forGroups.title: For Mutual Aid Groups
items: Get verified through peer vouching
Submit funding requests for your community
Respond to anonymous help requests in your area
No invasive requirements or paperwork

step1.title: Groups join
step1.description: Local groups are invited by a fund hub and verified through peer attestation.

step2.title: Groups request funding
step2.description: Verified groups submit requests—no recipient names or personal details required.

step3.title: Hubs route funds
step3.description: Fund hubs review, approve, and track. Groups confirm receipt. Done.

whatIs.title: What Relay Is
items: A coordination tool—not a fundraising platform
Built for privacy: no recipient databases, no tracking
A bridge between fund hubs and local mutual aid groups

whatIsNot.title: What Relay Is Not
items: Not a place where people seeking help create accounts
Not a case management system
Not a donor portal or fundraising site

safety.title: Safety by Design
safety.subtitle: We can't hand over what we don't have.

forIndividuals.title: For people seeking help
items: No account, no login, no personal info collected
Anonymous encrypted messaging
Automatic deletion after 7 days
No browsing history or analytics

forOrgs.title: For organizations
items: Only group-level data, never individual recipients
Role-based emails, not personal addresses
Aggregate reporting only—no drill-down
Data minimization at every step

items.title: Use Signal for sensitive details
items.description: Relay is for coordination. Move personal conversations to encrypted channels.

items.title: Don't include personal info in requests
items.description: Request fields are for amounts and categories—not names or stories.

pilot.title: Pilot Program
pilot.description: Relay is running a small-scale pilot with select partners to validate the approach before wider release.
details: Partners can opt out at any time

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Questions about Relay or interested in the pilot? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your organization and how we might work together...
